name: Fairmont Hot Springs
description: With a total of 14 runs, ranging from green to black in skill level, the Fairmont Hot Springs Ski Area provides an ideal family ski experience. Enjoy our resort’s nearly non-existent lift lines, the un-crowded trails, and runs of perfect corduroy and panoramic views of the stunning Purcell and Rocky Mountains. And don't forget teh incredible hot springs after a day on the slopes.
